titleStmt.title: A second vindication of The reasonableness of Christianity, &c, by the author of The reasonableness of Christinaity, &c.
titleStmt.author: Locke, John, 1632-1704.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for A. and J. Churchill... and Edward Castle ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Locke by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
"Occasioned by John Edward's The Socinian creed which was a reply to Locke's Reasonableness of Christianity"--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
